title: Foundations of smart technology-based crack detection in civil infrastructure

context.prior_knowledge: Basic civil engineering concepts and comprehension of computer vision technology
context.additional_context: The learners are office/administrative professionals interested in improving structural safety inspection processes in real-world work environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of the deep learning-based FRCNN-ResNet model and analyze its application in detecting cracks in civil structures.
Learners can simulate the operational process of a real-time crack detection system using UAV and computer vision technology.
Learners can collaborate with team members to write project reports analyzing actual structural image data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
